about_the_game:
The land of Acadia is tainted, weathered, raw, and you have been unlucky enough to find yourself on this forsaken isle...



Azarine Heart is an open-world RPG, where choices, actions, and words all matter. Like the butterfly effect, a small action can have unforeseen consequences. Stranded on the isle of Acadia, a small but important island off the mainland of Ralvan, you must find your way through Blight-ridden camps, dust storms, vicious bandits and killers, dangerous wildlife, and above all else, your own pitiful self, with only one goal; to find her. Nothing matters but her, your sister, robbed from you by cultists in the night. Forced into choices that will decide the fate of Acadia and its people, what will you do, what will you sacrifice, in her name?

Gameplay Features

  • An active battle system, where your weapons and skills matter less than your skill and focus.

  • Over 600 hand-crafted locations, from soaring mountains, to deep woods, to dark caverns below the earth...

  • Willing followers, bound by love or duty, whose goals may differ from yours...

  • Seven factions, each serving their own purpose in Acadia.

  • Choices. The fates of people, each with their own lives, or bigger than that. Cities, provinces, the world at large...all lands into your hands. Will you do the right thing? Or will you do something worse...for power?

    Steam Features

  • Achievements! Find motivation in serving under all factions, or joining all covenants, or picking apart every corner of Acadia for secrets and hidden gems...literally and metaphorically.
  • Controller support using Joy-to-Key. Configure this however you'd like using this software, found right in the game files under "Controls".
  • Family sharing is also supported!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04 or higher
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD 2400 or comparable
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Will probably need WineHQ to run, in theory

short_description: What will you sacrifice for the safety of your sister? An open-world, 2D RPG that encourages an open playstyle, and fitting into whatever role you can think of; evil sorcerer, brave barbarian, or a sly, lucky thief.
